word: "And hereby we do know that we know Him, if we keep His commandments. He that saith, I know him, and keepeth not His commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him. But whosoever keepeth His word, in him verily is the love of God perfected." This is true Bible sanctification, to love God and to keep His commandments.--Ms 2, 1874, pp. 5, 6. ("Diary--1," 1874, January 1 to February 16, 1874.)
